House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01823
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF AN INDIGENOUS PEOPLES TRAINING AND LEARNING CENTER IN THE PROVINCE OF BOHOL, PRESERVING THE CULTURE AND LANGUAGE OF THE 'ESKAYA' AND PROVIDING THEM LIVELIHOOD OPPORTUNITIES, THROUGH EDUCATION, SEMINARS AND LITERACY PROGRAMS FOR LANGUAGE AND CULTURAL PRESERVATION, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
